availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Alexander Pilcher (Caldwell County, Kentucky, carpenter)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, carpenter. North Carolina native. Son of Levica Pilcher. Married to Nancy Elizabeth Estes Pilcher in Cass County, Missouri, on October 3, 1852. Father of Newman Pilcher, Catharine S. Pilcher, and Nancy Pilcher. Resident of Jackson County, Missouri, in 1850. Carpenter in Caldwell County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Missouri, Jackson County, Van Buren, District, p. 355A.

Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Missouri, Bates County, Grand River, p. 56A.
Missouri Marriage Records, Missouri State Archives, Jefferson City, Missouri, Cass County Marriages, p. 205.
